trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] drawing surface.
trans-unit.target: 封裝[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]繪圖介面。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The Graphics class provides methods for drawing objects to the display device.
trans-unit.target: 圖形類別提供方法給顯示裝置繪圖物件。

trans-unit.source: A Graphics is associated with a specific device context.
trans-unit.target: 圖形都與特定的裝置內容。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain a Graphics object by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on an object that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control?displayProperty=fullName>, or by handling a control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint?displayProperty=fullName> event and accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由呼叫取得圖形物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法繼承自物件上的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control?displayProperty=fullName>，或藉由處理控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint?displayProperty=fullName>事件及存取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A>屬性的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also create a Graphics object from an image by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以建立從映像的圖形物件，使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a Graphics object, see [How to: Create Graphics Objects for Drawing](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需建立圖形物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 建立繪製的圖形物件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can draw many different shapes and lines by using a Graphics object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 圖形物件，以繪製許多不同的圖案和線條。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to draw lines and shapes, see the specific `Draw`*GraphicalElement* method for the line or shape you want to draw.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何繪製線條和圖案的詳細資訊，請參閱特定`Draw` *GraphicalElement*行或您想要繪製的圖形的方法。

trans-unit.source: These methods include <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawLine%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawArc%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawClosedCurve%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawPolygon%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法包括<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawLine%2A>， <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawArc%2A>， <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawClosedCurve%2A>， <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawPolygon%2A>，和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawRectangle%2A>。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawPolygon%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawClosedCurve%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawArc%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to draw lines and shapes, see [Using a Pen to Draw Lines and Shapes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Using a Brush to Fill Shapes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何繪製線條和圖案的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用畫筆繪製線條和圖案](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[使用筆刷填滿圖形](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can also draw images and icons by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawIcon%2A> methods, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以藉由繪製影像和圖示<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawIcon%2A>方法，分別。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawIcon%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: To perform a bit-block transfer of color data from the screen to the drawing surface of the Graphics object, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要從螢幕的色彩資料位元區塊傳輸執行的圖形物件之繪圖介面中，請參閱<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to draw images with a Graphics object, see [Working with Images, Bitmaps, Icons, and Metafiles](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何繪製圖形物件包含的映像的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用影像、 點陣圖、 圖示和中繼檔](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can manipulate the coordinate system used by the Graphics object.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您可以管理圖形物件所使用的座標系統。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the coordinate system and how to manipulate it, see [Coordinate Systems and Transformations](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關座標系統以及如何操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[座標系統和轉換](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Adds a comment to the current <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將註解加入至目前<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is valid only if this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is associated with a <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics><xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>相關聯</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>時才有效此

trans-unit.source: Array of bytes that contains the comment.
trans-unit.target: 包含註解的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: Saves a graphics container with the current state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and opens and uses a new graphics container.
trans-unit.target: 目前的狀態儲存圖形容器<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>並開啟及使用新的圖形容器。

trans-unit.source: Use this method with the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method to create nested graphics containers.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法加<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法，以建立巢狀的圖形容器。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Graphics containers retain graphics state, such as transformation, clipping region, and rendering properties.
trans-unit.target: 圖形容器保留圖形的狀態，例如轉換、 裁剪區域和呈現屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you call the BeginContainer method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, an information block that holds the state of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is put on a stack.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫的 BeginContainer 方法<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>，保留狀態的資訊區塊<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>放在堆疊上。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The BeginContainer method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> that identifies that information block.
trans-unit.target: BeginContainer 方法會傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>可識別該資訊區塊。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>

trans-unit.source: When you pass the identifying object to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the state it was in at the time of the BeginContainer method call.
trans-unit.target: 當您識別物件傳遞至<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法，資訊區塊會從堆疊移除，且用來還原<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>狀態當時 BeginContainer 方法呼叫的時間。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Containers can be nested; that is, you can call the BeginContainer method several times before you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以是巢狀容器。也就是說，您可以呼叫 BeginContainer 方法多次呼叫之前<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each time you call the BeginContainer method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> for the information block.
trans-unit.target: 每當您呼叫 BeginContainer 方法，一個資訊區塊會放在堆疊上，而且您收到<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>資訊區塊。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>

trans-unit.source: When you pass one of those objects to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is returned to the state it was in at the time of the BeginContainer method call that returned that particular <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 當您將傳遞的其中一個物件的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>會回復成傳回該特定<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>狀態它已在 BeginContainer 方法時呼叫</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The information block placed on the stack by that BeginContainer method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that BeginContainer method call are also removed.
trans-unit.target: 資訊區塊放上的堆疊 BeginContainer 方法呼叫會從堆疊移除，也會移除該 BeginContainer 方法呼叫之後，該堆疊置於所有資訊區塊。

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the BeginContainer method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>相同 BeginContainer 方法的呼叫堆疊上方法的位置資訊區塊。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: Just as an <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method call is paired with a BeginContainer method call, a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 就像<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法呼叫搭配 BeginContainer 方法呼叫，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法呼叫搭配<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the BeginContainer method) after the corresponding call to the BeginContainer method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法或 BeginContainer 方法) 從堆疊移除對應至 BeginContainer 方法呼叫之後。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, when you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the BeginContainer method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法或 BeginContainer 方法) 之後的對應呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法會從堆疊移除。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The graphics state established by the BeginContainer method includes the rendering qualities of the default graphics state; any rendering-quality state changes existing when the method is called are reset to the default values.
trans-unit.target: BeginContainer 方法所建立的圖形狀態包括預設圖形狀態; 的呈現品質任何現有的呼叫方法時的呈現品質狀態變更會重設為預設值。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer"></xref> that represents the state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> at the time of the method call.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer"></xref>這個狀態表示<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>在方法呼叫的時間。

trans-unit.source: Saves a graphics container with the current state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and opens and uses a new graphics container with the specified scale transformation.
trans-unit.target: 目前的狀態儲存圖形容器<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>並開啟和使用新的圖形容器，使用指定之縮放變換。

trans-unit.source: Use this method with the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method to create nested graphics containers.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法加<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法，以建立巢狀的圖形容器。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Graphics containers retain graphics state, such as transformation, clipping region, and rendering properties.
trans-unit.target: 圖形容器保留圖形的狀態，例如轉換、 裁剪區域和呈現屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, an information block that holds the state of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is put on a stack.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>，保留狀態的資訊區塊<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>放在堆疊上。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> that identifies that information block.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>可識別該資訊區塊。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you pass the identifying object to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 當您識別物件傳遞至<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法，資訊區塊會從堆疊移除，且用來還原<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>的時間當時的狀態<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Containers can be nested; that is, you can call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method several times before you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以是巢狀容器。也就是說，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法多次，才能呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each time you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> for the information block.
trans-unit.target: 每次呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法，一個資訊區塊會放在堆疊上，而且您收到<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>資訊區塊。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you pass one of those objects to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is returned to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call that returned that particular <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 當您將傳遞的其中一個物件的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>傳回給<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>該特定</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>的時間當時的狀態</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The information block placed on the stack by that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call are also removed.
trans-unit.target: 資訊區塊放置在堆疊上的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫會從堆疊移除，且之後的所有資訊區塊放都置於該堆疊上<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫也會移除。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>相同呼叫堆疊上方法的位置資訊區塊<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: Just as an <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call, a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 就像<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法呼叫搭配<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法呼叫搭配<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法或由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法) 之後的對應呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法會從堆疊移除。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, when you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法或由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法) 之後的對應呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法會從堆疊移除。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method specifies a scale transformation for the new graphics container with the `dstrect` and `srcrect` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會指定與新的圖形容器的縮放變換`dstrect`和`srcrect`參數。

trans-unit.source: The scale is equal to the transformation that, when applied to `srcrect`, results in `dstrect`.
trans-unit.target: 小數位數等於轉換，當套用至`srcrect`，導致`dstrect`。

trans-unit.source: The graphics state established by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method includes the rendering qualities of the default graphics state; any rendering-quality state changes existing when the method is called are reset to the default values.
trans-unit.target: 所建立的圖形狀態<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法包含預設的圖形狀態的呈現品質，則任何現有的呼叫方法時的呈現品質狀態變更會重設為預設值。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that, together with the `srcrect` parameter, specifies a scale transformation for the container.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>結構，並搭配`srcrect`參數，指定容器的縮放變換。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that, together with the `dstrect` parameter, specifies a scale transformation for the container.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>結構，並搭配`dstrect`參數，指定容器的縮放變換。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"></xref> enumeration that specifies the unit of measure for the container.
trans-unit.target: 成員的<xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"></xref>列舉，指定容器的測量單位。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer"></xref> that represents the state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> at the time of the method call.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer"></xref>這個狀態表示<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>在方法呼叫的時間。

trans-unit.source: Saves a graphics container with the current state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and opens and uses a new graphics container with the specified scale transformation.
trans-unit.target: 目前的狀態儲存圖形容器<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>並開啟和使用新的圖形容器，使用指定之縮放變換。

trans-unit.source: Use this method with the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method to create nested graphics containers.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法加<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法，以建立巢狀的圖形容器。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Graphics containers retain graphics state, such as transformation, clipping region, and rendering properties.
trans-unit.target: 圖形容器保留圖形的狀態，例如轉換、 裁剪區域和呈現屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, an information block that holds the state of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is put on a stack.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>，保留狀態的資訊區塊<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>放在堆疊上。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> that identifies that information block.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>可識別該資訊區塊。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you pass the identifying object to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 當您識別物件傳遞至<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法，資訊區塊會從堆疊移除，且用來還原<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>的時間當時的狀態<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Containers can be nested; that is, you can call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method several times before you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以是巢狀容器。也就是說，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法多次，才能呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each time you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> for the information block.
trans-unit.target: 每次呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法，一個資訊區塊會放在堆疊上，而且您收到<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>資訊區塊。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you pass one of those objects to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is returned to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call that returned that particular <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 當您將傳遞的其中一個物件的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>傳回給<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>該特定</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>的時間當時的狀態</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The information block placed on the stack by that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call are also removed.
trans-unit.target: 資訊區塊放置在堆疊上的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫會從堆疊移除，且之後的所有資訊區塊放都置於該堆疊上<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫也會移除。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>相同呼叫堆疊上方法的位置資訊區塊<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: Just as an <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call, a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 就像<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法呼叫搭配<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法呼叫搭配<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the `Save` method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由`Save`方法或由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法) 之後的對應呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法會從堆疊移除。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, when you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法或由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法) 之後的對應呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法會從堆疊移除。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method specifies a scale transformation for the new graphics container with the `dstrect` and `srcrect` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會指定與新的圖形容器的縮放變換`dstrect`和`srcrect`參數。

trans-unit.source: The scale is equal to the transformation that, when applied to `srcrect`, results in `dstrect`.
trans-unit.target: 小數位數等於轉換，當套用至`srcrect`，導致`dstrect`。

trans-unit.source: The graphics state established by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method includes the rendering qualities of the default graphics state; any rendering-quality state changes existing when the method is called are reset to the default values.
trans-unit.target: 所建立的圖形狀態<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法包含預設的圖形狀態的呈現品質，則任何現有的呼叫方法時的呈現品質狀態變更會重設為預設值。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that, together with the `srcrect` parameter, specifies a scale transformation for the new graphics container.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>結構，並搭配`srcrect`參數，指定新圖形容器的縮放變換。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that, together with the `dstrect` parameter, specifies a scale transformation for the new graphics container.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>結構，並搭配`dstrect`參數，指定新圖形容器的縮放變換。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"></xref> enumeration that specifies the unit of measure for the container.
trans-unit.target: 成員的<xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"></xref>列舉，指定容器的測量單位。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer"></xref> that represents the state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> at the time of the method call.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer"></xref>這個狀態表示<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>在方法呼叫的時間。

trans-unit.source: Clears the entire drawing surface and fills it with the specified background color.
trans-unit.target: 清除整個繪圖介面，並填滿指定的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The Clear method clears the state of the graphics object and should not be called when the graphics object cannot be updated.
trans-unit.target: 清除方法清除圖形物件的狀態，並不應該呼叫時的圖形物件無法更新。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the Clear method is called on a secure desktop in a terminal server session, an <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException> may occur, leaving the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object in an inconsistent state.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果在終端機伺服器工作階段中，呼叫 Clear 方法在安全桌面上<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>可能會發生，離開<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件不一致的狀態。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that represents the background color of the drawing surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，表示繪圖介面的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> that limits the drawing region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> ，它會限制的繪圖區域<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Modifying the <xref:System.Drawing.Region> object returned by the Clip property does not affect subsequent drawing with the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: 修改<xref:System.Drawing.Region>剪輯屬性所傳回的物件不會影響後續的繪圖<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Region>

trans-unit.source: To change the clip region, replace the Clip property value with a new <xref:System.Drawing.Region> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更的裁剪區域，取代剪輯屬性值與新<xref:System.Drawing.Region>物件。</xref:System.Drawing.Region>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the clipping region is infinite, retrieve the Clip property and call its <xref:System.Drawing.Region.IsInfinite%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否為無限的裁剪區域，擷取剪輯屬性並呼叫其<xref:System.Drawing.Region.IsInfinite%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Region.IsInfinite%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> that limits the portion of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that is currently available for drawing.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> ，它會限制這個部分<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>目前可用於繪圖。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that bounds the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>結構會框住的裁剪區域<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The unit for resulting rectangle is designated by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 產生的矩形的單位由所指定<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default unit is pixels.
trans-unit.target: 預設單位為像素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is typically associated with a control and the origin of the rectangle will be relative to the client area of that control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>通常與控制項相關聯的來源矩形將會相對於該控制項的用戶端區域。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: If the clipping region is infinite, the ClipBounds property returns a meaningless large rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 如果是無限的裁剪區域，ClipBounds 屬性會傳回一個無意義的大矩形。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the clipping region is infinite, retrieve the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A> property and call its <xref:System.Drawing.Region.IsInfinite%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否為無限的裁剪區域，擷取<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>屬性並呼叫其<xref:System.Drawing.Region.IsInfinite%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Region.IsInfinite%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that represents a bounding rectangle for the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref>結構，表示這個之裁剪區域的周框<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies how composited images are drawn to this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指定如何將複合影像繪製至這個<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The compositing mode determines whether pixels from a source image overwrite or are combined with background pixels.
trans-unit.target: 複合模式決定是否從來源映像素為單位覆寫，或會結合背景像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should not use a CompositingMode property value of <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode> when the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您不應該使用的屬性值 CompositingMode<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode>時的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode>

trans-unit.source: An exception could occur or the image may not render correctly.
trans-unit.target: 無法在發生例外狀況或映像可能無法正確呈現。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies a member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性指定的成員<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode"></xref>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rendering quality of composited images drawn to this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定之複合影像繪製至這個的呈現品質<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The compositing quality determines the rendering quality level of composited images.
trans-unit.target: 複合品質決定之複合影像的呈現品質等級。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies a member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingQuality"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性指定的成員<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingQuality"></xref>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingQuality"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingQuality"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Performs a bit-block transfer of color data, corresponding to a rectangle of pixels, from the screen to the drawing surface of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 執行從之繪圖介面的螢幕的像素矩形相對應的色彩資料位元區塊傳輸<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The CopyFromScreen methods are useful for layering one image on top of another.
trans-unit.target: CopyFromScreen 方法可用於分層之上另一個映像。

trans-unit.source: To specify how the source and destination colors are blended, use one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A> methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定來源和目的地的色彩混合的方式，使用其中一種<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>方法，取得<xref:System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation>參數。</xref:System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>

trans-unit.source: The point at the upper-left corner of the source rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 來源矩形左上角的點。

trans-unit.source: The point at the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 目的矩形左上角的點。

trans-unit.source: The size of the area to be transferred.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送的區域大小。

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: 作業失敗。

trans-unit.source: Performs a bit-block transfer of color data, corresponding to a rectangle of pixels, from the screen to the drawing surface of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 執行從之繪圖介面的螢幕的像素矩形相對應的色彩資料位元區塊傳輸<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A> methods are useful for layering one image on top of another.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>方法可用於分層之上另一個映像。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `copyPixelOperation` parameter allows you to specify if and how the source colors should be blended with the colors in the destination area.
trans-unit.target: `copyPixelOperation`參數可讓您可以指定如果及來源色彩應該如何混合使用之目標區域中的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The point at the upper-left corner of the source rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 來源矩形左上角的點。

trans-unit.source: The point at the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 目的矩形左上角的點。

trans-unit.source: The size of the area to be transferred.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送的區域大小。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: copyPixelOperation is not a member of .
trans-unit.target: copyPixelOperation不是成員的 。

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: 作業失敗。

trans-unit.source: Performs a bit-block transfer of the color data, corresponding to a rectangle of pixels, from the screen to the drawing surface of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 執行從之繪圖介面的螢幕的像素矩形相對應的色彩資料位元區塊傳輸<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A> methods are useful for layering one image on top of another.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>方法可用於分層之上另一個映像。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify how the source and destination colors are blended, use one of the CopyFromScreen methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定來源和目的地的色彩混合的方式，使用其中一個會採用 CopyFromScreen 方法<xref:System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation>參數。</xref:System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the point at the upper-left corner of the source rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 來源矩形左上角之點的 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the point at the upper-left corner of the source rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 來源矩形左上角之點的 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the point at the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 目的矩形左上角之點的 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the point at the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 目的矩形左上角之點的 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: The size of the area to be transferred.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送的區域大小。

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: 作業失敗。

trans-unit.source: Performs a bit-block transfer of the color data, corresponding to a rectangle of pixels, from the screen to the drawing surface of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 執行從之繪圖介面的螢幕的像素矩形相對應的色彩資料位元區塊傳輸<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A> methods are useful for layering one image on top of another.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>方法可用於分層之上另一個映像。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `copyPixelOperation` parameter allows you to specify if and how the source colors should be blended with the colors in the destination area.
trans-unit.target: `copyPixelOperation`參數可讓您可以指定如果及來源色彩應該如何混合使用之目標區域中的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the point at the upper-left corner of the source rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 來源矩形左上角之點的 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the point at the upper-left corner of the source rectangle
trans-unit.target: 來源矩形左上角之點的 y 座標

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the point at the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 目的矩形左上角之點的 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the point at the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 目的矩形左上角之點的 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: The size of the area to be transferred.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送的區域大小。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: copyPixelOperation is not a member of .
trans-unit.target: copyPixelOperation不是成員的 。

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: 作業失敗。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Calling Dispose allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 Dispose 允許所使用的資源<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>都重新配置用於其他用途。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal resolution of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個的水平解析度<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating high-resolution applications, see [High DPI](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=159804).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立高解析度的應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱[高 DPI](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=159804)。

trans-unit.source: The value, in dots per inch, for the horizontal resolution supported by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值，以每英吋，這支援的水平解析度<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical resolution of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個的垂直解析度<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating high-resolution applications, see [High DPI](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=159804).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立高解析度的應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱[高 DPI](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=159804)。

trans-unit.source: The value, in dots per inch, for the vertical resolution supported by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值，以每英吋，這支援的垂直解析度<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Draws an arc representing a portion of an ellipse specified by a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 繪製弧形，表示所指定的橢圓形的一部分<xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: This method draws an arc that is a portion of the perimeter of an ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製弧形，是周邊的橢圓形的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The ellipse is defined by the boundaries of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 定義橢圓形的矩形界限。

trans-unit.source: The arc is the portion of the perimeter of the ellipse between the `startAngle` parameter and the `startAngle` + `sweepAngle` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 弧線是部分之間的橢圓形周邊`startAngle`參數和`startAngle` + `sweepAngle`參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the arc.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>決定色彩、 寬度和樣式的弧形。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that defines the boundaries of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>結構，定義橢圓形的邊界。

trans-unit.source: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the x-axis to the starting point of the arc.
trans-unit.target: 以度為單位的角度測量朝順時針方向從 x 軸弧線的起點。

trans-unit.source: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the `startAngle` parameter to ending point of the arc.
trans-unit.target: 以度為單位的角度測量朝順時針方向從`startAngle`弧線的終點的參數。

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.target: 繪製弧形，表示所指定的橢圓形的一部分<xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: This method draws an arc that is a portion of the perimeter of an ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製弧形，是周邊的橢圓形的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The ellipse is defined by the boundaries of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 定義橢圓形的矩形界限。

trans-unit.source: The arc is the portion of the perimeter of the ellipse between the `startAngle` parameter and the `startAngle` + `sweepAngle` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 弧線是部分之間的橢圓形周邊`startAngle`參數和`startAngle` + `sweepAngle`參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the arc.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>決定色彩、 寬度和樣式的弧形。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that defines the boundaries of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>結構，定義橢圓形的邊界。

trans-unit.source: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the x-axis to the starting point of the arc.
trans-unit.target: 以度為單位的角度測量朝順時針方向從 x 軸弧線的起點。

trans-unit.source: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the `startAngle` parameter to ending point of the arc.
trans-unit.target: 以度為單位的角度測量朝順時針方向從`startAngle`弧線的終點的參數。

trans-unit.source: pen is
trans-unit.target: pen是

trans-unit.source: Draws an arc representing a portion of an ellipse specified by a pair of coordinates, a width, and a height.
trans-unit.target: 繪製弧形，表示由一對座標、 寬度和高度所指定的橢圓形的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This method draws an arc that is a portion of the perimeter of an ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製弧形，是周邊的橢圓形的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The ellipse is defined by the boundaries of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 定義橢圓形的矩形界限。

trans-unit.source: The arc is the portion of the perimeter of the ellipse between the `startAngle` parameter and the `startAngle` + `sweepAngle` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 弧線是部分之間的橢圓形周邊`startAngle`參數和`startAngle` + `sweepAngle`參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the arc.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>決定色彩、 寬度和樣式的弧形。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle that defines the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 定義橢圓形的矩形的左上角 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle that defines the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 定義橢圓形的矩形的左上角 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Width of the rectangle that defines the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 定義橢圓形的矩形的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Height of the rectangle that defines the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 定義橢圓形的矩形的高度。

trans-unit.source: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the x-axis to the starting point of the arc.
trans-unit.target: 以度為單位的角度測量朝順時針方向從 x 軸弧線的起點。

trans-unit.source: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the `startAngle` parameter to ending point of the arc.
trans-unit.target: 以度為單位的角度測量朝順時針方向從`startAngle`弧線的終點的參數。

trans-unit.source: rects is a zero-length array.
trans-unit.target: rects為零長度陣列。

trans-unit.source: Draws an arc representing a portion of an ellipse specified by a pair of coordinates, a width, and a height.
trans-unit.target: 繪製弧形，表示由一對座標、 寬度和高度所指定的橢圓形的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle that defines the ellipse.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle that defines the ellipse.

trans-unit.source: Height of the rectangle that defines the ellipse.

trans-unit.source: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the x-axis to the starting point of the arc.
trans-unit.target: 以度為單位的角度測量朝順時針方向從 x 軸弧線的起點。

trans-unit.target: 以度為單位的角度測量朝順時針方向從`startAngle`弧線的終點的參數。

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: Draws a Bézier spline defined by four <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: 繪製由四個定義的貝茲曲線<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: The Bézier curve is drawn from the first point to the fourth point.
trans-unit.target: 第四個點會從第一個點繪製貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: The second and third points are control points that determine the shape of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 第二個和第三個點都控制點，決定曲線的形狀。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> structure that determines the color, width, and style of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>結構，決定色彩、 寬度和樣式的曲線。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structure that represents the starting point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>結構，表示曲線的起點。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structure that represents the first control point for the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>結構，表示曲線的第一個控制點。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structure that represents the second control point for the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>結構，表示曲線的第二個控制點。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structure that represents the ending point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>結構，表示曲線的結束點。

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: Draws a Bézier spline defined by four <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: 繪製由四個定義的貝茲曲線<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: The Bézier spline is drawn from the first point to the fourth point.
trans-unit.target: 第四個點會從第一個點繪製貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: The second and third points are control points that determine the shape of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 第二個和第三個點都控制點，決定曲線的形狀。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>決定色彩、 寬度和樣式的曲線。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structure that represents the starting point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>結構，表示曲線的起點。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structure that represents the first control point for the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>結構，表示曲線的第一個控制點。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structure that represents the second control point for the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>結構，表示曲線的第二個控制點。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structure that represents the ending point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>結構，表示曲線的結束點。

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: Draws a Bézier spline defined by four ordered pairs of coordinates that represent points.
trans-unit.target: 繪製由四個的排序配對，代表點之座標所定義的貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: The Bézier spline is drawn from the first point to the fourth point.
trans-unit.target: 第四個點會從第一個點繪製貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: The second and third points are control points that determine the shape of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 第二個和第三個點都控制點，決定曲線的形狀。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>決定色彩、 寬度和樣式的曲線。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the starting point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 曲線開始點的 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the starting point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 曲線開始點的 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the first control point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 曲線的第一個控制點的 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the first control point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 曲線的第一個控制點的 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the second control point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 曲線的第二個控制點的 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the second control point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 曲線的第二個控制點的 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the ending point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 曲線結束點的 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the ending point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 曲線結束點的 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: Draws a series of Bézier splines from an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: 從陣列繪製一系列的貝茲曲線<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: The number of points in the array should be a multiple of 3 plus 1 because the first spline requires 4 points and any other splines require 3 points each.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中的點數應該是 3 的倍數加 1，因為第一個曲線需要有 4 個點，而且任何其他曲線需要 3 點。

trans-unit.source: The first Bézier spline is drawn from the first point to the fourth point in the point array.
trans-unit.target: 第一個貝茲曲線的點陣列中的第四個點會繪製從第一個點。

trans-unit.source: The second and third points are control points that determine the shape of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 第二個和第三個點都控制點，決定曲線的形狀。

trans-unit.source: Each subsequent curve needs exactly three more points: two more control points and an ending point.
trans-unit.target: 每個後續的曲線需要正好是三個的多個點︰ 兩個控制點和結束點。

trans-unit.source: The ending point of the previous curve is used as the starting point for each additional curve.
trans-unit.target: 前一個曲線的結束點作為起始點，為每個額外的曲線。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>決定色彩、 寬度和樣式的曲線。

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures that represent the points that determine the curve.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> ，此結構表示決定曲線的點。

trans-unit.source: The number of points in the array should be a multiple of 3 plus 1, such as 4, 7, or 10.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中的點數應該是 3 的倍數加 1，例如 4、 7 或 10。

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: -or- points is .
trans-unit.target: -or- points is .

trans-unit.source: Draws a series of Bézier splines from an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: 從陣列繪製一系列的貝茲曲線<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: The number of points in the array should be a multiple of 3 plus 1 because the first spline requires 4 points and any other splines require 3 points each.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中的點數應該是 3 的倍數加 1，因為第一個曲線需要有 4 個點，而且任何其他曲線需要 3 點。

trans-unit.source: The first Bézier curve is drawn from the first point to the fourth point in the point array.
trans-unit.target: 貝茲曲線的第一個會從第一個點繪製的點陣列中的第四個點。

trans-unit.source: The second and third points are control points that determine the shape of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 第二個和第三個點都控制點，決定曲線的形狀。

trans-unit.source: Each subsequent curve needs exactly three more points: two more control points and an ending point.
trans-unit.target: 每個後續的曲線需要正好是三個的多個點︰ 兩個控制點和結束點。

trans-unit.source: The ending point of the previous curve is used as the starting point for each additional curve.
trans-unit.target: 前一個曲線的結束點作為起始點，為每個額外的曲線。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>決定色彩、 寬度和樣式的曲線。

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that represent the points that determine the curve.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> ，此結構表示決定曲線的點。

trans-unit.source: The number of points in the array should be a multiple of 3 plus 1, such as 4, 7, or 10.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中的點數應該是 3 的倍數加 1，例如 4、 7 或 10。

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: -or- points is .
trans-unit.target: -or- points is .

trans-unit.source: Draws a closed cardinal spline defined by an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: 繪製的陣列所定義的封閉基線曲線<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: This method draws a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製通過陣列中的每個點的封閉基本曲線。

trans-unit.source: If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close the figure.
trans-unit.target: 如果最後一個點不符合第一個點，會將額外的曲線線段加入的最後一個點表示關閉圖形的第一個點。

trans-unit.source: The array of points must contain at least four <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures.
trans-unit.target: 點陣列必須包含至少&4; 個<xref:System.Drawing.Point>結構。</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: This method uses a default tension of 0.5.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and height of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>決定色彩、 寬度和高度的曲線。

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures that define the spline.

trans-unit.source: Draws a closed cardinal spline defined by an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: 繪製的陣列所定義的封閉基線曲線<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: This method draws a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製通過陣列中的每個點的封閉基本曲線。

trans-unit.source: If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it.
trans-unit.target: 如果最後一個點不符合第一個點，會將額外的曲線線段加入的最後一個點的第一個點，以將它關閉。

trans-unit.source: The array of points must contain at least four <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures.
trans-unit.target: 點陣列必須包含至少&4; 個<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>結構。</xref:System.Drawing.PointF>

trans-unit.source: This method uses a default tension of 0.5.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and height of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>決定色彩、 寬度和高度的曲線。

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that define the spline.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>定義曲線的結構。

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: -or- points is .
trans-unit.target: -or- points is .

trans-unit.source: Draws a closed cardinal spline defined by an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures using a specified tension.
trans-unit.target: 繪製的陣列所定義的封閉基線曲線<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>結構使用指定的張力。

trans-unit.source: This method draws a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製通過陣列中的每個點的封閉基本曲線。

trans-unit.source: If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it.
trans-unit.target: 如果最後一個點不符合第一個點，會將額外的曲線線段加入的最後一個點的第一個點，以將它關閉。

trans-unit.source: The array of points must contain at least four <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures.
trans-unit.target: 點陣列必須包含至少&4; 個<xref:System.Drawing.Point>結構。</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: The `tension` parameter determines the shape of the spline.
trans-unit.target: `tension`參數會決定曲線的形狀。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `tension` parameter is 0.0F, this method draws straight line segments to connect the points.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`tension`參數是 0.0，這個方法會繪製的直線線段連接的點。

trans-unit.source: Usually, the `tension` parameter is less than or equal to 1.0F.
trans-unit.target: 通常，`tension`參數小於或等於 1.0 f。

trans-unit.source: Values over 1.0F produce unusual results.
trans-unit.target: 透過 1.0 f 的值不會產生不尋常的結果。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and height of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>決定色彩、 寬度和高度的曲線。

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures that define the spline.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>定義曲線的結構。

trans-unit.source: Value greater than or equal to 0.0F that specifies the tension of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 值大於或等於 0.0 f，指定曲線的張力。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"></xref> enumeration that determines how the curve is filled.
trans-unit.target: 成員的<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"></xref>列舉，可判斷填滿曲線的方法。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required but ignored.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數是必要，但是被忽略。

trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> ，此結構表示定義曲線的點。

trans-unit.source: Draws a cardinal spline through a specified array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: 繪製穿過指定陣列的<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: The drawing begins offset from the beginning of the array.
trans-unit.target: 從陣列開頭位移開始繪製。

trans-unit.source: This method draws a cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製在通過陣列中每個點的基本曲線。

trans-unit.source: The array of points must contain at least three <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures for a curve to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 點陣列必須包含至少三個<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>曲線要繪製的結構。</xref:System.Drawing.PointF>

trans-unit.source: The value of the `offset` parameter specifies the number of elements to skip in the array.
trans-unit.target: 值`offset`參數指定要在陣列中略過的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The first element after the skipped elements represents the starting point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 已略過的項目之後的第一個項目代表曲線開始點。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter specifies the number of segments, after the starting point, to draw in the curve.
trans-unit.target: 值`numberOfSegments`參數之後的起點，若要在曲線中繪製指定的區段數目。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter must be at least 1.
trans-unit.target: 值`numberOfSegments`參數必須至少為 1。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `offset` parameter plus the value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter must be less than the number of elements in the array of the `points` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 值`offset`參數加上值`numberOfSegments`參數必須是少於陣列中的項目數目`points`參數。

trans-unit.source: This method uses a default tension of 0.5.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>決定色彩、 寬度和樣式的曲線。

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that define the spline.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>定義曲線的結構。

trans-unit.source: Offset from the first element in the array of the `points` parameter to the starting point in the curve.
trans-unit.target: 從陣列中的第一個項目位移`points`參數在曲線中的起始點。

trans-unit.source: Number of segments after the starting point to include in the curve.
trans-unit.target: 若要在曲線中包括的起點後的線段數目。

trans-unit.target: 值`offset`參數加上值`numberOfSegments`參數必須是少於陣列中的項目數目`points`參數。

trans-unit.source: The `tension` parameter determines the shape of the spline.
trans-unit.target: `tension`參數會決定曲線的形狀。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `tension` parameter is 0.0F, this method draws straight line segments to connect the points.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`tension`參數是 0.0，這個方法會繪製的直線線段連接的點。

trans-unit.source: Usually, the `tension` parameter is less than or equal to 1.0F.
trans-unit.target: 通常，`tension`參數小於或等於 1.0 f。

trans-unit.source: Values over 1.0F produce unusual results.
trans-unit.target: 透過 1.0 f 的值不會產生不尋常的結果。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>決定色彩、 寬度和樣式的曲線。

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that define the spline.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>定義曲線的結構。

trans-unit.source: Offset from the first element in the array of the `points` parameter to the starting point in the curve.
trans-unit.target: 從陣列中的第一個項目位移`points`參數在曲線中的起始點。

trans-unit.source: Number of segments after the starting point to include in the curve.
trans-unit.target: 若要在曲線中包括的起點後的線段數目。

trans-unit.source: Value greater than or equal to 0.0F that specifies the tension of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 值大於或等於 0.0 f，指定曲線的張力。

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: -or- points is .
trans-unit.target: -or- points is .

trans-unit.source: Draws an ellipse specified by a bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 繪製由界限指定的橢圓形<xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: This method draws an ellipse that is defined by the bounding rectangle specified by the `rect` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製由指定的周框所定義的橢圓形`rect`參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>決定色彩、 寬度和樣式的橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that defines the boundaries of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>結構，定義橢圓形的邊界。

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: Draws an ellipse defined by a bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 繪製由界限所定義的橢圓形<xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method draws an ellipse that is defined by the bounding rectangle specified by the `rect` parameter.

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: Draws an ellipse defined by a bounding rectangle specified by coordinates for the upper-left corner of the rectangle, a height, and a width.
trans-unit.target: 繪製由矩形、 高度和寬度的左上角的座標指定的周框所定義的橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: This method draws an ellipse that is defined by the bounding rectangle described by the `x`, `y`, `width`, and `height` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製所描述之周框所定義的橢圓形`x`， `y`， `width`，和`height`參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>決定色彩、 寬度和樣式的橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 週框定義橢圓形的矩形的左上角的 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 週框定義橢圓形的矩形的左上角的 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Width of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 週框定義橢圓形的矩形的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Height of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 週框定義橢圓形的矩形的高度。

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: Draws an ellipse defined by a bounding rectangle specified by a pair of coordinates, a height, and a width.
trans-unit.target: 繪製由一對座標、 高度和寬度所指定的周框所定義的橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: This method draws an ellipse that is defined by the bounding rectangle described by the `x`, `y`, `width`, and `height` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製所描述之周框所定義的橢圓形`x`， `y`， `width`，和`height`參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>決定色彩、 寬度和樣式的橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 週框定義橢圓形的矩形的左上角的 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 週框定義橢圓形的矩形的左上角的 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Width of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 週框定義橢圓形的矩形的寬度。

trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: Draws the image represented by the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> within the area specified by a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 繪製由指定的映像<xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref>內所指定的區域<xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref>若要繪製。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that specifies the location and size of the resulting image on the display surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>結構，在顯示介面上指定的位置和所產生影像的大小。

trans-unit.source: The image contained in the `icon` parameter is scaled to the dimensions of this rectangular area.
trans-unit.target: 映像中包含`icon`參數會調整為這個矩形區域的維度。

trans-unit.source: icon is .
trans-unit.target: iconis .

trans-unit.source: Draws the image represented by the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 繪製由指定的映像<xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref>位於指定座標。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref>若要繪製。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 繪製影像左上角的 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 繪製影像左上角的 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: icon is .
trans-unit.target: iconis .

trans-unit.source: Draws the image represented by the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> without scaling the image.
trans-unit.target: 繪製由指定的映像<xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref>不縮放影像。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref>若要繪製。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that specifies the location and size of the resulting image.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>結構，指定產生的映像的大小與位置。

trans-unit.source: The image is not scaled to fit this rectangle, but retains its original size.
trans-unit.target: 映像不會縮放以符合這個矩形，但會保留其原始大小。

trans-unit.source: If the image is larger than the rectangle, it is clipped to fit inside it.
trans-unit.target: 如果影像比矩形大，則會裁剪以納入內文。

trans-unit.source: icon is .
trans-unit.target: iconis .

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>, using its original physical size, at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 繪製指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>，原始的實體大小，使用指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image>儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋點數） 的值。</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution.
trans-unit.target: 實體的寬度，以英吋，映像的單位是像素寬度除以水平解析度。

trans-unit.source: For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，216 像素寬度和水平解析度每 72 英吋的映像有實體 3 英吋的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 類似的備註適用於像素高度和實體的高度。

trans-unit.source: This method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製影像使用的實體大小，讓映像將會擁有正確的大小是以英吋，不論顯示裝置的解析度 （每英吋點數）。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設映像有 216 像素寬度和水平解析度 72 每英吋的點數。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)*96 = 288.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫此方法以繪製該映像的裝置解析度為 96 dpi 上時，所呈現影像的像素寬度會 (216/72) * 96 = 288。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>若要繪製。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structure that represents the location of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>結構，表示繪製影像的左上角的位置。

trans-unit.source: image is .
trans-unit.target: imageis .

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> at the specified location and with the specified shape and size.
trans-unit.target: 繪製指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>以指定的形狀和大小，在指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 三個<xref:System.Drawing.Point>結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: The image represented by the `image` parameter is scaled and sheared to fit the shape of the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所表示的影像`image`參數可調整且修剪來符合所指定的平行四邊形的圖形`destPoints`參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>若要繪製。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures that define a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 陣列的三個<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>定義平行四邊形的結構。

trans-unit.source: image is .
trans-unit.target: imageis .

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>, using its original physical size, at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 繪製指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>，原始的實體大小，使用指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image>儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋點數） 的值。</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution.
trans-unit.target: 實體的寬度，以英吋，映像的單位是像素寬度除以水平解析度。

trans-unit.source: For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，216 像素寬度和水平解析度每 72 英吋的映像有實體 3 英吋的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 類似的備註適用於像素高度和實體的高度。

trans-unit.source: This method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製影像使用的實體大小，讓映像將會擁有正確的大小是以英吋，不論顯示裝置的解析度 （每英吋點數）。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設映像有 216 像素寬度和水平解析度 72 每英吋的點數。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)*96 = 288.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫此方法以繪製該映像的裝置解析度為 96 dpi 上時，所呈現影像的像素寬度會 (216/72) * 96 = 288。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>若要繪製。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structure that represents the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>結構，表示繪製影像的左上角。

trans-unit.source: image is .
trans-unit.target: imageis .

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> at the specified location and with the specified shape and size.
trans-unit.target: 繪製指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>以指定的形狀和大小，在指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 三個<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。</xref:System.Drawing.PointF>

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: The image represented by the `image` object is scaled and sheared to fit the shape of the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 所表示的影像`image`物件是調整及修剪來符合所指定的平行四邊形的圖形`destPoints`參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>若要繪製。
