trans-unit.target: 陣列的三個<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>定義平行四邊形的結構。

trans-unit.target: imageis .

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> at the specified location and with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 繪製指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>以指定的大小，在指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: The image represented by the `image` object is scaled to the dimensions of the `rect` rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 所表示的影像`image`物件會調整的尺寸為`rect`矩形。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>若要繪製。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that specifies the location and size of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>結構，指定繪製影像的大小與位置。

trans-unit.source: image is .
trans-unit.target: imageis .

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> at the specified location and with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 繪製指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>以指定的大小，在指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: The image represented by the `image` object is scaled to the dimensions of the `rect` rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 所表示的影像`image`物件會調整的尺寸為`rect`矩形。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>若要繪製。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>結構，指定繪製影像的大小與位置。

trans-unit.target: imageis .

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified image, using its original physical size, at the location specified by a coordinate pair.
trans-unit.target: 繪製由座標對所指定的位置使用原始的實體大小，將指定的影像。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image>儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋點數） 的值。</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution.
trans-unit.target: 實體的寬度，以英吋，映像的單位是像素寬度除以水平解析度。

trans-unit.source: For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，216 像素寬度和水平解析度每 72 英吋的映像有實體 3 英吋的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 類似的備註適用於像素高度和實體的高度。

trans-unit.source: The DrawImage method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: DrawImage 方法繪製影像使用的實體大小，讓映像將會擁有正確的大小是以英吋，不論顯示裝置的解析度 （每英吋點數）。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設映像有 216 像素寬度和水平解析度 72 每英吋的點數。

trans-unit.source: If you call DrawImage to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)*96 = 288.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫 DrawImage 解析度為 96 dpi 的裝置上繪製該映像時，所呈現影像的像素寬度會 (216/72) * 96 = 288。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to draw.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image>儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋點數） 的值。</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution.
trans-unit.target: 實體的寬度，以英吋，映像的單位是像素寬度除以水平解析度。

trans-unit.source: For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，216 像素寬度和水平解析度每 72 英吋的映像有實體 3 英吋的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 類似的備註適用於像素高度和實體的高度。

trans-unit.source: This method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製影像使用的實體大小，讓映像將會擁有正確的大小是以英吋，不論顯示裝置的解析度 （每英吋點數）。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設映像有 216 像素寬度和水平解析度 72 每英吋的點數。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)*96 = 288.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫此方法以繪製該映像的裝置解析度為 96 dpi 上時，所呈現影像的像素寬度會 (216/72) * 96 = 288。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>若要繪製。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 繪製影像左上角的 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 繪製影像左上角的 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: image is .
trans-unit.target: imageis .

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified portion of the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> at the specified location and with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 繪製指定的指定的部分<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>以指定的大小，在指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 三個<xref:System.Drawing.Point>結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw.
trans-unit.target: `srcRect`參數指定的矩形部分`image`繪製的物件。

trans-unit.source: This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個部分會調整及修剪來配合所指定的平行四邊形`destPoints`參數。

trans-unit.source: image is .
trans-unit.target: imageis .

trans-unit.source: Draws a portion of an image at a specified location.
trans-unit.target: 映像的一部分繪製於指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image>儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋點數） 的值。</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution.
trans-unit.target: 實體的寬度，以英吋，映像的單位是像素寬度除以水平解析度。

trans-unit.source: For example, an image with a pixel width of 360 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 5 inches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，像素寬度 360 和每 72 英吋的水平解析度的影像具有實體寬度為 5 英吋。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 類似的備註適用於像素高度和實體的高度。

trans-unit.source: This method draws a portion of an image using its physical size, so the image portion will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製影像使用的實體大小，因此影像部分會有正確的大小是以英吋，不論顯示裝置的解析度 （每英吋點數） 的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image portion has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設影像部分有 216 像素寬度和水平解析度 72 每英吋的點數。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method to draw that image portion on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image portion will be (216/72)*96 = 288.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫這個方法的裝置解析度為 96 dpi 上繪製影像部分時，所呈現的影像部分的像素寬度會 (216/72) * 96 = 288。

trans-unit.target: 繪製影像的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Height of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 繪製影像的高度。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified portion of the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> at the specified location and with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 繪製指定的指定的部分<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>以指定的大小，在指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: The `srcX`, `srcY`, `srcWidth`, and `srcHeight` parameters specify a rectangular portion, of the `image` object to draw.
trans-unit.target: `srcX`， `srcY`， `srcWidth`，和`srcHeight`參數指定矩形的部分，`image`繪製的物件。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle is relative to the upper-left corner of the source image.
trans-unit.target: 矩形是相對於來源影像的左上角。

trans-unit.source: This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個部分會調整為適合所指定的矩形內`destRect`參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to draw.

trans-unit.source: The image is scaled to fit the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 縮放影像來符合矩形。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the portion of the source image to draw.

trans-unit.source: Draws a specified image using its original physical size at a specified location.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的影像繪製於指定位置中使用原始的實體大小。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image>儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋點數） 的值。</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution.
trans-unit.target: 實體的寬度，以英吋，映像的單位是像素寬度除以水平解析度。

trans-unit.source: For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，216 像素寬度和水平解析度每 72 英吋的映像有實體 3 英吋的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 類似的備註適用於像素高度和實體的高度。

trans-unit.source: The DrawImageUnscaled method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: 使用的實體大小，讓映像將會擁有正確的大小是以英吋，不論解析度 （每英吋） 顯示裝置的影像繪製 DrawImageUnscaled 方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設映像有 216 像素寬度和水平解析度 72 每英吋的點數。

trans-unit.source: If you call DrawImageUnscaled to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)*96 = 288.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫 DrawImageUnscaled 解析度為 96 dpi 的裝置上繪製該映像時，所呈現影像的像素寬度會 (216/72) * 96 = 288。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 繪製影像左上角的 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 繪製影像左上角的 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: image is .
trans-unit.target: imageis .

trans-unit.source: Draws a specified image using its original physical size at a specified location.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的影像繪製於指定位置中使用原始的實體大小。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image>儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋點數） 的值。</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution.
trans-unit.target: 實體的寬度，以英吋，映像的單位是像素寬度除以水平解析度。

trans-unit.source: For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，216 像素寬度和水平解析度每 72 英吋的映像有實體 3 英吋的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 類似的備註適用於像素高度和實體的高度。

trans-unit.source: The DrawImageUnscaled method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: 使用的實體大小，讓映像將會擁有正確的大小是以英吋，不論解析度 （每英吋） 顯示裝置的影像繪製 DrawImageUnscaled 方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設映像有 216 像素寬度和水平解析度 72 每英吋的點數。

trans-unit.source: If you call DrawImageUnscaled to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)*96 = 288.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫 DrawImageUnscaled 解析度為 96 dpi 的裝置上繪製該映像時，所呈現影像的像素寬度會 (216/72) * 96 = 288。

trans-unit.source: Not used.

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified image without scaling and clips it, if necessary, to fit in the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 繪製指定的影像，而不會縮放和裁剪，如有必要，以符合指定的矩形中。

trans-unit.source: Draws a series of line segments that connect an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: 繪製一系列連接的陣列的直線線段<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: This method draws a series of lines connecting an array of ending points.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製一系列的連接線的結束點陣列。

trans-unit.source: The first two points in the array specify the first line.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中的前兩個點指定的第一行。

trans-unit.source: Each additional point specifies the end of a line segment whose starting point is the ending point of the previous line segment.
trans-unit.target: 每個額外的點指定直線線段的起點是先前的直線線段的結束點的結束。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the line segments.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>決定色彩、 寬度和樣式的直線線段。

trans-unit.target: 圖形內容中目前的轉換套用至<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>繪製之前。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>

trans-unit.source: Draws a pie shape defined by an ellipse specified by a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure and two radial lines.
trans-unit.target: 繪製由橢圓形所定義的派形<xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>結構和兩條放射線。

trans-unit.source: This method draws a pie shape defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製由橢圓形和兩條放射線交集的弧形弧線的端點定義的派形。

trans-unit.source: The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 周框定義橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: The pie shape consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters, and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 包含的兩條放射線所定義的派形`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`參數，以及這些放射線橢圓形交集之間的弧度。

trans-unit.source: If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sweepAngle`參數大於 360 度或小於-360 度，它會被視為分別是 360 度或-360 度。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>決定色彩、 寬度和樣式的派形。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that represents the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie shape comes.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>結構，表示定義派形的來源的橢圓形之周框。

trans-unit.source: Angle measured in degrees clockwise from the x-axis to the first side of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: 角度測量派形的順時針方向從 x 軸到第一個邊的角度。

trans-unit.source: Angle measured in degrees clockwise from the `startAngle` parameter to the second side of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: 以順時針方向從的度為單位的角度`startAngle`參數到派形的第二個邊。

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: Draws a pie shape defined by an ellipse specified by a coordinate pair, a width, a height, and two radial lines.
trans-unit.target: 繪製由座標對、 寬度、 高度和兩條放射線所指定的橢圓形所定義的派形。

trans-unit.source: This method draws a pie shape defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製由橢圓形和兩條放射線交集的弧形弧線的端點定義的派形。

trans-unit.source: The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle described by the `x`, `y`, `width`, and `height` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所描述的週框定義橢圓形`x`， `y`， `width`，和`height`參數。

trans-unit.source: The pie shape consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters, and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 包含的兩條放射線所定義的派形`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`參數，以及這些放射線橢圓形交集之間的弧度。

trans-unit.target: 如果`sweepAngle`參數大於 360 度或小於-360 度，它會被視為分別是 360 度或-360 度。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>決定色彩、 寬度和樣式的派形。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie shape comes.
trans-unit.target: 週框定義派形的來源的橢圓形的矩形的左上角的 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie shape comes.
trans-unit.target: 週框定義派形的來源的橢圓形的矩形的左上角的 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Width of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie shape comes.
trans-unit.target: 週框定義派形的來源的橢圓形的矩形的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Height of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie shape comes.
trans-unit.target: 週框定義派形的來源的橢圓形的矩形的高度。

trans-unit.source: Angle measured in degrees clockwise from the x-axis to the first side of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: 角度測量派形的順時針方向從 x 軸到第一個邊的角度。

trans-unit.source: Angle measured in degrees clockwise from the `startAngle` parameter to the second side of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: 以順時針方向從的度為單位的角度`startAngle`參數到派形的第二個邊。

trans-unit.source: Draws a polygon defined by an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: 繪製的陣列所定義的多邊形<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: Every pair of two consecutive points in the array specifies a side of the polygon.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中的兩個連續點的每一對指定的側邊的多邊形。

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the last point and the first point of the array do not coincide, they specify the last side of the polygon.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果不重疊的最後一個點和陣列的第一個點，它們會指定最後一個的側邊的多邊形。

trans-unit.target: 將指定的文字字串繪製在指定的矩形，具有指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>和<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The text represented by the `s` parameter is drawn inside the rectangle represented by the `layoutRectangle` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 所代表的文字`s`參數所表示的矩形內繪製`layoutRectangle`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the text does not fit inside the rectangle, it is truncated at the nearest word.
trans-unit.target: 如果文字不符合置於矩形內，它會截斷在最接近的字。

trans-unit.source: To further manipulate how the string is drawn inside the rectangle use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> overload that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>.
trans-unit.target: 若要進一步將字串置於矩形內繪製的方式來操作使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>多載會採用<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Closes the current graphics container and restores the state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the state saved by a call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer*> method.
trans-unit.target: 關閉目前的圖形容器，並還原這個狀態<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>呼叫所儲存的狀態<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer*>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer*>

trans-unit.source: Use this method with the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method to create nested graphics containers.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法加<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法，以建立巢狀的圖形容器。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Graphics containers retain graphics state, such as transformation, clipping region, and rendering properties.
trans-unit.target: 圖形容器保留圖形的狀態，例如轉換、 裁剪區域和呈現屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, an information block that holds the state of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is put on a stack.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>，保留狀態的資訊區塊<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>放在堆疊上。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> that identifies that information block.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>可識別該資訊區塊。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you pass the identifying object to the EndContainer method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 當您將識別的物件傳遞至 EndContainer 方法時，資訊區塊會從堆疊移除，且用來還原<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>的時間當時的狀態<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Containers can be nested; that is, you can call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method several times before you call the EndContainer method.
trans-unit.target: 可以是巢狀容器。也就是說，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>數次，才能呼叫 EndContainer 方法的方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each time you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> for the information block.
trans-unit.target: 每次呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法，一個資訊區塊會放在堆疊上，而且您收到<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>資訊區塊。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you pass one of those objects to the EndContainer method, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is returned to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call that returned that particular <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 當您將傳遞的其中一個物件 EndContainer 方法，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>傳回給<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>該特定</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>的時間當時的狀態</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The information block placed on the stack by that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call are also removed.
trans-unit.target: 資訊區塊放置在堆疊上的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫會從堆疊移除，且之後的所有資訊區塊放都置於該堆疊上<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫也會移除。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>相同呼叫堆疊上方法的位置資訊區塊<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: Just as an EndContainer method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call, a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 就像 EndContainer 方法呼叫搭配<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法呼叫搭配<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call the EndContainer method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫 EndContainer 方法時，所有的資訊區塊會放置在堆疊上 (由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法或由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法) 之後的對應呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法會從堆疊移除。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, when you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法或由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法) 之後的對應呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法會從堆疊移除。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer"></xref> that represents the container this method restores.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer"></xref>表示這個方法會還原的容器。

trans-unit.source: Updates the clip region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to exclude the area specified by a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 這個的裁剪區域更新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>排除所指定的區域<xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: This method excludes the area specified by the `rect` parameter from the current clip region and assigns the resulting area to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A> property of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會排除所指定的區域`rect`從目前裁剪區域參數，並將產生的區域指派給<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>此<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>屬性</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that specifies the rectangle to exclude from the clip region.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>結構，指定要從裁剪區域排除的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Updates the clip region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to exclude the area specified by a <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個的裁剪區域更新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>排除所指定的區域<xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method excludes the area specified by the `region` parameter from the current clip region and assigns the resulting area to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A> property of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會排除所指定的區域`region`從目前裁剪區域參數，並將產生的區域指派給<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>此<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>屬性</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> that specifies the region to exclude from the clip region.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>指定要從裁剪區域排除的區域。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline curve defined by an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: 填滿的陣列所定義之封閉的基本曲線內部<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: This method fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會填入通過陣列中的每個點的封閉基本曲線內部。

trans-unit.source: If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it.
trans-unit.target: 如果最後一個點不符合第一個點，會將額外的曲線線段加入的最後一個點的第一個點，以將它關閉。

trans-unit.source: The array of points must contain at least four <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures.
trans-unit.target: 點陣列必須包含至少&4; 個<xref:System.Drawing.Point>結構。</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: This method uses a default tension of 0.5.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the characteristics of the fill.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>決定填滿的特性。

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures that define the spline.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>定義曲線的結構。

trans-unit.source: brush is .
trans-unit.target: brushis .

trans-unit.source: -or- points is .
trans-unit.target: -or- points is .

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline curve defined by an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: 填滿的陣列所定義之封閉的基本曲線內部<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: This method fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會填入通過陣列中的每個點的封閉基本曲線內部。

trans-unit.source: If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it.
trans-unit.target: 如果最後一個點不符合第一個點，會將額外的曲線線段加入的最後一個點的第一個點，以將它關閉。

trans-unit.source: The array of points must contain at least four <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures.
trans-unit.target: 點陣列必須包含至少&4; 個<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>結構。</xref:System.Drawing.PointF>

trans-unit.source: This method uses a default tension of 0.5.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the characteristics of the fill.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>決定填滿的特性。

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that define the spline.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>定義曲線的結構。

trans-unit.source: brush is .
trans-unit.target: brushis .

trans-unit.source: -or- points is .
trans-unit.target: -or- points is .

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline curve defined by an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures using the specified fill mode.
trans-unit.target: 填滿的陣列所定義之封閉的基本曲線內部<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>結構使用指定的填滿模式。

trans-unit.source: This method fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會填入通過陣列中的每個點的封閉基本曲線內部。

trans-unit.source: If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it.
trans-unit.target: 如果最後一個點不符合第一個點，會將額外的曲線線段加入的最後一個點的第一個點，以將它關閉。

trans-unit.source: The array of points must contain at least four <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures.
trans-unit.target: 點陣列必須包含至少&4; 個<xref:System.Drawing.Point>結構。</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: This method uses a default tension of 0.5.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the characteristics of the fill.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>決定填滿的特性。

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures that define the spline.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>定義曲線的結構。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"></xref> enumeration that determines how the curve is filled.
trans-unit.target: 成員的<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"></xref>列舉，可判斷填滿曲線的方法。

trans-unit.source: brush is .
trans-unit.target: brushis .

trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>定義曲線的結構。

trans-unit.target: -or- points is .

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline curve defined by an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures using the specified fill mode and tension.
trans-unit.target: 填滿的陣列所定義之封閉的基本曲線內部<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>結構使用指定的填滿模式和張力。

trans-unit.source: This method fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會填入通過陣列中的每個點的封閉基本曲線內部。

trans-unit.source: If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it.
trans-unit.target: 如果最後一個點不符合第一個點，會將額外的曲線線段加入的最後一個點的第一個點，以將它關閉。

trans-unit.source: The array of points must contain at least four <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures.
trans-unit.target: 點陣列必須包含至少&4; 個<xref:System.Drawing.Point>結構。</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: The `tension` parameter determines the shape of the spline.
trans-unit.target: `tension`參數會決定曲線的形狀。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `tension` parameter is 0.0F, this method draws straight line segments to connect the points.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`tension`參數是 0.0，這個方法會繪製的直線線段連接的點。

trans-unit.source: Usually, the `tension` parameter is less than or equal to 1.0F.
trans-unit.target: 通常，`tension`參數小於或等於 1.0 f。

trans-unit.source: Values over 1.0F produce unusual results.
trans-unit.target: 透過 1.0 f 的值不會產生不尋常的結果。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the characteristics of the fill.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>決定填滿的特性。

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures that define the spline.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>定義曲線的結構。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"></xref> enumeration that determines how the curve is filled.
trans-unit.target: 成員的<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"></xref>列舉，可判斷填滿曲線的方法。

trans-unit.source: Value greater than or equal to 0.0F that specifies the tension of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 值大於或等於 0.0 f，指定曲線的張力。

trans-unit.source: Usually, the `tension` parameter is less than or equal to 1.0F.
trans-unit.target: 通常，`tension`參數小於或等於 1.0 f。

trans-unit.source: Values over 1.0F produce unusual results.
trans-unit.target: 透過 1.0 f 的值不會產生不尋常的結果。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of an ellipse defined by a bounding rectangle specified by a pair of coordinates, a width, and a height.
trans-unit.target: 填滿由一對座標、 寬度和高度所指定的周框所定義的橢圓形內部。

trans-unit.source: This method fills the interior of an ellipse with a <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會填入與<xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>的橢圓形內部

trans-unit.source: The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle represented by the `x`, `y`, `width`, and `height` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所代表的週框定義橢圓形`x`， `y`， `width`，和`height`參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the characteristics of the fill.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>決定填滿的特性。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 週框定義橢圓形的矩形的左上角的 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 週框定義橢圓形的矩形的左上角的 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Width of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 週框定義橢圓形的矩形的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Height of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 週框定義橢圓形的矩形的高度。

trans-unit.target: brushis .

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 填滿內部<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> consists of a series of line and curve segments.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>直線和曲線線段的一系列所組成。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>

trans-unit.source: If the path represented by the `path` parameter is not closed, an additional segment is added from the last point to the first point to close the path.
trans-unit.target: 如果路徑以表示`path`參數未關閉，額外的區段加入的最後一個點来關閉路徑的第一個點。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the characteristics of the fill.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>決定填滿的特性。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> that represents the path to fill.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>表示要填滿的路徑。

trans-unit.source: brush is .
trans-unit.target: brushis .

trans-unit.source: -or- path is .
trans-unit.target: -or- path is .

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a pie section defined by an ellipse specified by a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure and two radial lines.
trans-unit.target: 填滿所指定的橢圓形所定義的派形區域內部<xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>結構和兩條放射線。

trans-unit.source: This method fills the interior of a pie section defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法填滿橢圓形和兩條放射線交集的弧形弧線的端點所定義的派形區域內部。

trans-unit.source: The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 周框定義橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: The pie section consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 包含的兩條放射線所定義的派形區段`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`參數和之間交集的那些放射線橢圓形弧線。

trans-unit.source: If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sweepAngle`參數大於 360 度或小於-360 度，它會被視為分別是 360 度或-360 度。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the characteristics of the fill.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>決定填滿的特性。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that represents the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>結構，表示定義派形區段的來源的橢圓形之周框。

trans-unit.source: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the x-axis to the first side of the pie section.
trans-unit.target: 以度為單位的角度測量朝順時針方向從 x 軸的派形區段的第一個邊。

trans-unit.source: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the `startAngle` parameter to the second side of the pie section.
trans-unit.target: 以度為單位的角度測量朝順時針方向從`startAngle`參數到派形區段的第二個邊。

trans-unit.source: brush is .
trans-unit.target: brushis .

trans-unit.target: 如果`sweepAngle`參數大於 360 度或小於-360 度，它會被視為分別是 360 度或-360 度。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the characteristics of the fill.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>決定填滿的特性。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.
trans-unit.target: 週框定義派形區段的來源的橢圓形的矩形的左上角的 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.
trans-unit.target: 週框定義派形區段的來源的橢圓形的矩形的左上角的 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Width of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.
trans-unit.target: 週框定義派形區段的來源的橢圓形的矩形的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Height of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.
trans-unit.target: 週框定義派形區段的來源的橢圓形的矩形的高度。

trans-unit.target: 以度為單位的角度測量朝順時針方向從 x 軸的派形區段的第一個邊。

trans-unit.source: If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sweepAngle`參數大於 360 度或小於-360 度，它會被視為分別是 360 度或-360 度。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.

trans-unit.source: Every two consecutive points in the array specify a side of the polygon.
trans-unit.target: 每個陣列中的兩個連續點指定多邊形的一邊。

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the last point and the first point do not coincide, they specify the closing side of the polygon.

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 允許物件嘗試釋放資源，並透過記憶體回收開始前執行其他清除作業。

trans-unit.source: Forces execution of all pending graphics operations and returns immediately without waiting for the operations to finish.
trans-unit.target: 強制執行所有暫止圖形作業，並立即傳回而不等待作業完成。

trans-unit.source: This method starts a flush and returns immediately without waiting for any currently executing graphics operation to finish.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會開始清除，並立即傳回而不等候任何目前正在執行的圖形作業完成。

trans-unit.source: Forces execution of all pending graphics operations with the method waiting or not waiting, as specified, to return before the operations finish.
trans-unit.target: 強制執行所有暫止圖形作業的方法，等待或不等待，依指定，以傳回作業完成之前。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention> for the `intention` parameter specifies that the method return immediately after beginning the flush, while a value of <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention> specifies that the method wait before returning until any existing operations finish.
trans-unit.target: 值為<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention>如`intention`參數會指定此方法傳回之後立即開始排清，而值為<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention>指定的方法，返回之前等候任何現有的作業完成之前。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention>

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention"></xref> enumeration that specifies whether the method returns immediately or waits for any existing operations to finish.
trans-unit.target: 成員的<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention"></xref>列舉，指定此方法會立即傳回或等待任何現有的作業完成。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> from the specified handle to a device context.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>從指定的裝置內容控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: You should always call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A> method to release the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> and related resources created by the FromHdc method.
trans-unit.target: 您應該一律呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A>方法，以釋放<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>和相關聯的 FromHdc 方法所建立的資源。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Even if the display device has an associated ICM color profile, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] will not use that profile by default.
trans-unit.target: 顯示裝置在沒有關聯的 ICM 色彩設定檔，[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]預設不會使用該設定檔。

trans-unit.source: To enable ICM for a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, construct the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> from an HDC after you pass the HDC (and ICM_ON) to the `SetICMMode` function.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用的 ICM <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>，建構<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>HDC 之後您將 HDC （和 ICM_ON） 傳遞給從`SetICMMode`函式。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Then any drawing done by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> will be adjusted according to the ICM profile associated with the display device.
trans-unit.target: 然後由任何繪圖<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>根據顯示裝置與相關聯的 ICM 設定檔，將會調整。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Enabling ICM will result in slower performance.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 ICM 會導致效能變慢。

trans-unit.source: The state of the device context (mapping mode, logical unit, and the like) at the time you call FromHdc can affect rendering done by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.
trans-unit.target: 裝置內容 （對應模式、 邏輯單元，等等） 呼叫 FromHdc 當時的狀態可能會影響轉譯完成<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Handle to a device context.
trans-unit.target: 裝置內容的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> for the specified device context.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>指定之裝置內容。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> from the specified handle to a device context and handle to a device.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>從裝置內容和裝置控制代碼指定的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: You should always call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A> method to release the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> and related resources created by the FromHdc method.
trans-unit.target: 您應該一律呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A>方法，以釋放<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>和相關聯的 FromHdc 方法所建立的資源。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Even if the display device has an associated ICM color profile, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] will not use that profile by default.

trans-unit.source: To enable ICM for a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, construct the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> from an HDC after you pass the HDC (and ICM_ON) to the `SetICMMode` function.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用的 ICM <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>，建構<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>HDC 之後您將 HDC （和 ICM_ON） 傳遞給從`SetICMMode`函式。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Then any drawing done by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> will be adjusted according to the ICM profile associated with the display device.
trans-unit.target: 然後由任何繪圖<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>根據顯示裝置與相關聯的 ICM 設定檔，將會調整。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Enabling ICM will result in slower performance.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 ICM 會導致效能變慢。

trans-unit.source: The state of the device context (mapping mode, logical unit, and the like) at the time you call FromHdc can affect rendering done by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.
trans-unit.target: 裝置內容 （對應模式、 邏輯單元，等等） 呼叫 FromHdc 當時的狀態可能會影響轉譯完成<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> for the specified device context.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>指定之裝置內容。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> from the specified handle to a window.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>從指定的視窗控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: You should always call the<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A> method to release the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> and related resources created by the FromHwnd method.
trans-unit.target: 您應該一律呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A>方法，以釋放<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>和相關聯的 FromHwnd 方法所建立的資源。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle to a window.
trans-unit.target: 視窗的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> for the specified window handle.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>指定之視窗控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> for the specified windows handle.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>針對指定的 windows 控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: This method should not be used.
trans-unit.target: 不應該使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Handle to a window.
trans-unit.target: 視窗的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> for the specified window handle.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>指定之視窗控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> from the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>從指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the image has an indexed pixel format, this method throws an exception with the message, "A Graphics object cannot be created from an image that has an indexed pixel format."
trans-unit.target: 如果影像具有索引像素格式，這個方法會擲回的例外狀況訊息、 「 從具有索引像素格式的映像不能建立圖形物件 」。

trans-unit.source: The indexed pixel formats are shown in the following list.
trans-unit.target: 下列清單中，會顯示索引像素格式。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> - <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> - <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> You can save the indexed image as another format by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%28System.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat%29> method and then retrieve a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object for the new image.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>- <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>-<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>可以藉由將索引的映像儲存為另一種格式<xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%28System.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat%29>方法，然後擷取<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>新映像的物件。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%28System.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat%29> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>

trans-unit.source: This method also throws an exception if the image has any of the following pixel formats.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也會擲回例外狀況如果該映像包含任何下列的像素格式。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> - <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> - <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> - <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> You should always call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A> method to release the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> and related resources created by the FromImage method.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>- <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>- <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>-<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>應該一律呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A>方法，以釋放<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>和相關聯的 FromImage 方法所建立的資源。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> from which to create the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>用來建立新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: image is .
trans-unit.target: imageis .

trans-unit.source: image has an indexed pixel format or its format is undefined.
trans-unit.target: image具有索引像素格式，或其格式是未定義。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cumulative graphics context.
trans-unit.target: 取得累計圖形內容。

trans-unit.source: The return value is an object array where the first element contains the cumulative clip region and the second element contains the cumulative translate/transform matrix.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是物件陣列，其中第一個項目包含的累積的裁剪區域，而第二個元素包含累積轉譯/轉換的矩陣。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the cumulative graphics context.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>代表累計圖形內容。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets a handle to the current Windows halftone palette.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的 Windows 半色調調色盤的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the GetHalftonePalette method is to enable [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] to produce a better quality halftone when the display uses 8 bits per pixel.
trans-unit.target: GetHalftonePalette 方法的目的是要啟用[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]顯示器使用的每個像素的 8 位元時，產生更好的品質半色調。

trans-unit.source: To display an image using the halftone palette, use the following procedure.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示使用半色調調色盤的映像，請使用下列程序。

trans-unit.source: Internal pointer that specifies the handle to the palette.
trans-unit.target: 指定調色盤的控制代碼的內部指標。

trans-unit.source: Gets the handle to the device context associated with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此相關聯的裝置內容的控制代碼<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The device context is a Windows structure based on [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] that defines a set of graphical objects and their associated attributes, as well as the graphical modes that affect output.
trans-unit.target: 裝置內容是根據 Windows 結構[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]，定義一組圖形物件和其相關聯的屬性，以及會影響輸出的圖形化模式。

trans-unit.source: This method returns that device context with the exception of a font.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回字型的裝置內容。

trans-unit.source: Because a font is not selected, calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Font.FromHdc%2A> method using a handle returned from the GetHdc method will fail.
trans-unit.target: 因為未選取字型，則呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Font.FromHdc%2A>方法使用 GetHdc 方法所傳回的控制代碼將會失敗。</xref:System.Drawing.Font.FromHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calls to the GetHdc and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A> methods must appear in pairs.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 GetHdc 和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A>方法必須出現在配對。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: During the scope of a GetHdc and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A> method pair, you usually make only calls to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] functions.
trans-unit.target: 在 GetHdc 範圍期間和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A>方法組，您通常只對進行呼叫[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calls in that scope made to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] methods of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that produced the `hdc` parameter fail with an `ObjectBusy` error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫，範圍對[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方法<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>產生`hdc`參數失敗，並`ObjectBusy`錯誤。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Also, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] ignores any state changes made to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> of the `hdc` parameter in subsequent operations.
trans-unit.target: 此外，[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]會忽略所做的狀態變更<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>的`hdc`後續作業中的參數。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Handle to the device context associated with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 與此相關聯的裝置內容控制代碼<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the nearest color to the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定的最接近色彩<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure for which to find a match.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，用來尋找相符項目。

trans-unit.source: A structure that represents the nearest color to the one specified with the color parameter.
trans-unit.target: A 結構，表示為與指定的最接近的色彩 color 參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interpolation mode associated with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與此相關聯的插補模式<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The interpolation mode determines how intermediate values between two endpoints are calculated.
trans-unit.target: 插補模式可讓您判斷兩個之間的中間值計算端點。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.InterpolationMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.InterpolationMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Updates the clip region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the intersection of the current clip region and the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 這個的裁剪區域更新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>為目前裁剪區域和所指定的交集<xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: This method assigns to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A> property of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> the area represented by the intersection of the current clip region and the rectangle specified by the `rect` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將指派給<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>屬性這<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>為目前裁剪區域和所指定的矩形的交集的區域`rect`參數。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure to intersect with the current clip region.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>要與目前裁剪區域交集的結構。

trans-unit.source: Updates the clip region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the intersection of the current clip region and the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 這個的裁剪區域更新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>為目前裁剪區域和所指定的交集<xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: This method assigns to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A> property of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> the area represented by the intersection of the current clip region and the rectangle specified by the `rect` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將指派給<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>屬性這<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>為目前裁剪區域和所指定的矩形的交集的區域`rect`參數。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure to intersect with the current clip region.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>要與目前裁剪區域交集的結構。

trans-unit.source: Updates the clip region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the intersection of the current clip region and the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個的裁剪區域更新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>為目前裁剪區域和所指定的交集<xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method assigns to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A> property of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> the area represented by the intersection of the current clip region and the region specified by the `region` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將指派給<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>屬性這<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>表示由目前裁剪區域和所指定區域交集的區域`region`參數。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to intersect with the current region.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>若要與目前區域交集。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> is empty.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否的裁剪區域<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>是空的。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> is empty; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這個裁剪區域<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>是空的否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structure is contained within the visible clip region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>結構是否包含在這個的可見裁剪區域<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structure to test for visibility.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>要測試可視性的結構。

trans-unit.source: if the point specified by the point parameter is contained within the visible clip region of this ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果所指定的點 point 參數內含的可見裁剪區域 ，否則 。

trans-unit.target: 如果所指定的點 point 參數內含的可見裁剪區域 ，否則 。

trans-unit.target: 如果所指定的矩形 rect 參數內含的可見裁剪區域 ，否則 。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the rectangle specified by a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure is contained within the visible clip region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指出所指定的矩形是否<xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>結構是否包含在這個的可見裁剪區域<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 如果所指定的矩形 rect 參數內含的可見裁剪區域 ，否則 。

trans-unit.target: 要測試可視性的點的 x 座標。

trans-unit.target: 要測試可視性的點的 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: if the point defined by the x and y parameters is contained within the visible clip region of this ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果所定義的點 x 和 y 參數內含的可見裁剪區域 ，否則 。

trans-unit.target: 要測試可視性的點的 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: if the point defined by the x and y parameters is contained within the visible clip region of this ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the visible clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> is empty.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否的可見裁剪區域<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>是空的。

trans-unit.source: The visible clipping region is the intersection of the clipping region of this `Graphics` and the clipping region of the window.
trans-unit.target: 之可見裁剪區域是這樣的裁剪區域的交集`Graphics`和視窗的裁剪區域。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the visible portion of the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> is empty; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這個裁剪區域的可見部分<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>是空的否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> objects, each of which bounds a range of character positions within the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 取得陣列的<xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>物件，其中每一個框住指定字串中字元位置的範圍。

trans-unit.source: The regions returned by this method are resolution-dependent, so there might be a slight loss of accuracy if strings are recorded in a metafile at one resolution and later played back at a different resolution.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所傳回的區域是精確度的解析度而定，因此可能會有些微遺失如果字串是精確度的一種解析度中繼檔中記錄，而且稍後播放不同解析度。

trans-unit.source: String to measure.
trans-unit.target: 要測量的字串。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that defines the text format of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>定義字串的文字格式。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that specifies the layout rectangle for the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>結構，指定字串的配置矩形。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> that represents formatting information, such as line spacing, for the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref>表示格式的資訊，例如行距字串。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> objects, each of which bounds a range of character positions within the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回的陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>物件，其中每一個框住指定字串中字元位置的範圍。

trans-unit.source: Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 測量指定的字串與指定物件繪製時<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>方法專為搭配個別字串和之前和之後要允許突出圖像 （glyph） 的字串，包含少量的額外空間設計。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>調整字符點以最佳化顯示品質的方法，並可能顯示比報告<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>窄字串</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A> method or one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>, and pass <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 取得度量資訊適用於配置 （例如，實作格式化的文字） 中的相鄰字串，請使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>方法或其中一個<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>方法，取得<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>，並傳遞<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, ensure the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，請<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A><xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>為<xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>。</xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>

trans-unit.source: String to measure.
trans-unit.target: 要測量的字串。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that defines the text format of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>定義字串的文字格式。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a structure that represents the size, in the units specified by the property, of the string specified by the text parameter as drawn with the font parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回結構，表示的大小，以指定的單位屬性所指定的字串 text 參數，以繪製 font 參數。

trans-unit.target: fontis .

trans-unit.source: Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> within the specified layout area.
trans-unit.target: 測量指定的字串與指定物件繪製時<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>內指定之配置區域。

trans-unit.target: 您也可以<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>調整字符點以最佳化顯示品質的方法，並可能顯示比報告<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>窄字串</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A> method or one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>, and pass <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 取得度量資訊適用於配置 （例如，實作格式化的文字） 中的相鄰字串，請使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>方法或其中一個<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>方法，取得<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>，並傳遞<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, ensure the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，請<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A><xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>為<xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>。</xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>

trans-unit.source: String to measure.
trans-unit.target: 要測量的字串。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> defines the text format of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>定義文字字串的格式。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> structure that specifies the maximum layout area for the text.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref>指定文字的最大配置區域的結構。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a structure that represents the size, in the units specified by the property, of the string specified by the text parameter as drawn with the font parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回結構，表示的大小，以指定的單位屬性所指定的字串 text 參數，以繪製 font 參數。

trans-unit.source: font is .
trans-unit.target: fontis .

trans-unit.source: Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 測量指定的字串與指定物件繪製時<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The `width` parameter specifies the maximum value of the width component of the returned <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF> structure (<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A>).
trans-unit.target: `width`參數指定的寬度元件所傳回的最大值<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF>結構 (<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A>)。</xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.SizeF>

trans-unit.source: If the `width` parameter is less than the actual width of the string, the returned <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> component is truncated to a value representing the maximum number of characters that will fit within the specified width.
trans-unit.target: 如果`width`參數是字串，傳回的實際寬度小於<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A>元件就會截斷為值，代表符合指定的寬度的字元的數目上限。</xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: To accommodate the entire string, the returned <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> component is adjusted to a value that allows displaying the string with character wrap.
trans-unit.target: 若要容納整個字串，傳回<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A>元件會調整為可讓顯示的字串字元換行的值。</xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>方法專為搭配個別字串和之前和之後要允許突出圖像 （glyph） 的字串，包含少量的額外空間設計。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>調整字符點以最佳化顯示品質的方法，並可能顯示比報告<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>窄字串</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A> method or one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>, and pass <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 取得度量資訊適用於配置 （例如，實作格式化的文字） 中的相鄰字串，請使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>方法或其中一個<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>方法，取得<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>，並傳遞<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, ensure the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，請<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A><xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>為<xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>。</xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>
